Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc19
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.GUI.Utils

Class GoalCardButton

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.control.Control
javafx.scene.control.Labeled
javafx.scene.control.ButtonBase
javafx.scene.control.Button
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.GUI.Utils.GoalCardButton
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, javafx.scene.control.Skinnable
public class GoalCardButton extends javafx.scene.control.Button
This class represents a generic button with a GoalCard as its graphic.

  • Method Details

    • buildTooltip

      private void buildTooltip()
      Build a Tooltip describing the GoalCard associated to the button. Duration of the tooltip is indefinite, and it follows mouse movement inside button.

    • clipCardImage

      private void clipCardImage(javafx.scene.image.ImageView cardImage)
      Clips the by a Rectangle with rounded corners.
      Parameters:
      cardImage - the ImageView to be clipped.

    • getCard

      public Card getCard()
      Getter for GoalCard associated to the button
      Returns:
      the GoalCard associated to the button

      the ImageView of the side currently seen.

    • getDefaultMouseClickedHandler

      public javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent> getDefaultMouseClickedHandler()
      Getter for default MouseEvent handler: when user double-click on the card, this swaps.
      Returns:
      the default MouseEvent handler for the card.

    • swap

      public void swap()
      Swaps side of the card.
